verses.verse: The beginning<WG746> of the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> the Son<WG5207> of God;<WG2316>

As <WG5613> it is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> prophets,<WG4396> Behold,<WG2400> I<WG1473> send<WG649> my<WG3450> messenger<WG32> before<WG4253> thy<WG4675> face,<WG4383> which<WG3739> shall prepare<WG2680> thy<WG4675> way<WG3598> before<WG1715> thee.<WG4675>

The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> wilderness,<WG2048> Prepare<WG2090> ye the<WG3588> way<WG3598> of the Lord,<WG2962> make<WG4160> his<WG846> paths<WG5147> straight.<WG2117>

John <WG2491> did<WG1096> baptize<WG907> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> wilderness,<WG2048> and<WG2532> preach<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for<WG1519> the remission<WG859> of sins.<WG266>

And <WG2532> there went out<WG1607> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> land<WG5561> of Judea,<WG2449> and<WG2532> they of Jerusalem,<WG2415> and<WG2532> were all<WG3956> baptized<WG907> of<WG5259> him<WG846> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> river<WG4215> of Jordan,<WG2446> confessing<WG1843> their<WG848> sins.<WG266>

And <WG1161> John<WG2491> was<WG2258> clothed with<WG1746> camel's<WG2574> hair,<WG2359> and<WG2532> with a girdle<WG2223> of a skin<WG1193> about<WG4012> his<WG848> loins;<WG3751> and<WG2532> he did eat<WG2068> locusts<WG200> and<WG2532> wild<WG66> honey;<WG3192>

And <WG2532> preached,<WG2784> saying,<WG3004> There cometh<WG2064> one<WG3588> mightier<WG2478> than I<WG3450> after<WG3694> me,<WG3450> the<WG3588> latchet<WG2438> of whose<WG848> shoes<WG5266> I<WG3739> am<WG1510> not<WG3756> worthy<WG2425> to stoop down<WG2955> and unloose.<WG3089>
I <WG1473> indeed<WG3303> have baptized<WG907> you<WG5209> with<WG1722> water:<WG5204> but<WG1161> he<WG846> shall baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> with<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>

And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days,<WG2250> that Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> from<WG575> Nazareth<WG3478> of Galilee,<WG1056> and<WG2532> was baptized<WG907> of<WG5259> John<WG2491> in<WG1519> Jordan.<WG2446>

And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> coming up<WG305> out of<WG575> the<WG3588> water,<WG5204> he saw<WG1492> the<WG3588> heavens<WG3772> opened,<WG4977> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> like<WG5616> a dove<WG4058> descending<WG2597> upon<WG1909> him: <WG846>
And <WG2532> there came<WG1096> a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> saying, Thou<WG4771> art<WG1488> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> Son,<WG5207> in<WG1722> whom<WG3739> I am well pleased.<WG2106>
And <WG2532> immediately<WG2117> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> driveth<WG1544> him<WG846> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> wilderness.<WG2048>

And <WG2532> he was<WG2258> there<WG1563> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> wilderness<WG2048> forty<WG5062> days,<WG2250> tempted<WG3985> of<WG5259> Satan;<WG4567> and<WG2532> was<WG2258> with<WG3326> the<WG3588> wild beasts;<WG2342> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> angels<WG32> ministered<WG1247> unto him.<WG846>

Now <WG1161> after<WG3326> that John<WG2491> was put in prison,<WG3860> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> Galilee,<WG1056> preaching<WG2784> the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> of the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316>

And <WG2532> saying,<WG3004> The <WG3588> time<WG2540> is fulfilled,<WG4137> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is at hand: <WG1448> repent<WG3340> ye, and<WG2532> believe<WG4100> the<WG3588> gospel. <WG2098>

Now <WG1161> as he walked<WG4043> by<WG3844> the<WG3588> sea<WG2281> of Galilee,<WG1056> he saw<WG1492> Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> Andrew<WG406> his<WG846> brother<WG80> casting<WG906> a net<WG293> into<WG1722> the<WG3588> sea:<WG2281> for<WG1063> they were<WG2258> fishers.<WG231>
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Come <WG1205> ye after<WG3694> me,<WG3450> and<WG2532> I will make<WG4160> you<WG5209> to become<WG1096> fishers<WG231> of men. <WG444>
And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> they forsook<WG863> their<WG848> nets,<WG1350> and<WG2532> followed<WG190> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> when he had gone<WG4260> a little farther<WG3641> thence,<WG1564> he saw<WG1492> James<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Zebedee,<WG2199> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> his<WG846> brother,<WG80> who<WG846> also<WG2532> were in<WG1722> the<WG3588> ship<WG4143> mending<WG2675> their nets.<WG1350>

And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> he called<WG2564> them:<WG846> and<WG2532> they left<WG863> their<WG848> father<WG3962> Zebedee<WG2199> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> ship<WG4143> with<WG3326> the<WG3588> hired servants,<WG3411> and<WG2532> went<WG565> after<WG3694> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> they went<WG1531> into<WG1519> Capernaum;<WG2584> and<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> on the<WG3588> sabbath day<WG4521> he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> synagogue,<WG4864> and taught.<WG1321>

And <WG2532> they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> doctrine:<WG1322> for<WG1063> he taught<WG2258> <WG1321> them<WG846> as<WG5613> one that had<WG2192> authority,<WG1849> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> as<WG5613> the<WG3588> scribes.<WG1122>
And <WG2532> there was<WG2258> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogue<WG4864> a man<WG444> with<WG1722> an unclean<WG169> spirit;<WG4151> and<WG2532> he cried out,<WG349>

saying, <WG3004> Let us alone;<WG1436> what have we to do with thee,<WG5101> <WG2254> <WG2532> <WG4671> thou Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth?<WG3479> art thou come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> us?<WG2248> I know<WG1492> thee<WG4571> who<WG5101> thou art,<WG1488> the<WG3588> Holy One<WG40> of God.<WG2316>
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Hold thy peace,<WG5392> and<WG2532> come<WG1831> out of<WG1537> him. <WG846>
And <WG2532> when the<WG3588> unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151> had torn<WG4682> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> he came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> they were all<WG3956> amazed,<WG2284> insomuch that<WG5620> they questioned<WG4802> among<WG4314> themselves<WG848> saying,<WG3004> What thing<WG5101> is<WG2076> this?<WG5124> what<WG5101> new<WG2537> doctrine<WG1322> is this?<WG3778> for<WG3754> with<WG2596> authority<WG1849> commandeth<WG2004> he even<WG2532> the<WG3588> unclean<WG169> spirits,<WG4151> and<WG2532> they do obey<WG5219> him.<WG846>
And <WG1161> immediately<WG2117> his<WG846> fame<WG189> spread abroad<WG1831> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> region round about<WG4066> Galilee.<WG1056>

And <WG2532> forthwith,<WG2112> when they were come<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> synagogue,<WG4864> they entered<WG2064> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> house<WG3614> of Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> Andrew,<WG406> with<WG3326> James<WG2385> and<WG2532> John.<WG2491>
But <WG1161> Simon's<WG4613> wife's mother<WG3994> lay<WG2621> sick of a fever,<WG4445> and<WG2532> anon<WG2112> they tell<WG3004> him<WG846> of<WG4012> her.<WG846>

And <WG2532> he came<WG4334> and took<WG2902> her<WG846> by the<WG3588> hand,<WG5495> and lifted her up;<WG1453> <WG846> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> the<WG3588> fever<WG4446> left<WG863> her,<WG846> and<WG2532> she ministered<WG1247> unto them.<WG846>

And <WG1161> at even,<WG3798> <WG1096> when<WG3753> the<WG3588> sun<WG2246> did set,<WG1416> they brought<WG5342> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> all<WG3956> that were diseased,<WG2192> <WG2560> and<WG2532> them that were possessed with devils.<WG1139>
And <WG2532> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> city<WG4172> was<WG2258> gathered together<WG1996> at<WG4314> the<WG3588> door.<WG2374>

And <WG2532> he healed<WG2323> many<WG4183> that were sick<WG2192> <WG2560> of divers<WG4164> diseases,<WG3554> and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> many<WG4183> devils;<WG1140> and<WG2532> suffered<WG863> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> devils<WG1140> to speak,<WG2980> because<WG3754> they knew<WG1492> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> in the morning,<WG1773> rising up<WG450> a great while before day,<WG3029> <WG4404> he went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> departed<WG565> into<WG1519> a solitary<WG2048> place,<WG5117> and there<WG2546> prayed.<WG4336>
And <WG2532> Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> they<WG3588> that were with<WG3326> him<WG846> followed after<WG2614> him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> when they had found<WG2147> him,<WG846> they said<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> All<WG3956> men seek for<WG2212> thee.<WG4571>

And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Let us go<WG71> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> next<WG2192> towns,<WG2969> that<WG2443> I may preach<WG2784> there also: <WG2546> for<WG1063> therefore <WG1519> <WG5124> came I forth. <WG1831>
And <WG2532> he preached<WG2258> <WG2784> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogues<WG4864> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> Galilee,<WG1056> and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> devils.<WG1140>

And <WG2532> there came<WG2064> a leper<WG3015> to<WG4314> him,<WG846> beseeching<WG3870> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> kneeling down<WG1120> to him,<WG846> and<WG2532> saying<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> If<WG1437> thou wilt,<WG2309> thou canst<WG1410> make me clean.<WG2511> <WG3165>

And <WG1161> Jesus,<WG2424> moved with compassion,<WG4697> put forth<WG1614> his hand,<WG5495> and touched<WG680> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> I will;<WG2309> be thou clean. <WG2511>
And, <WG2532> as soon as he<WG846> had spoken,<WG2036> immediately<WG2112> the<WG3588> leprosy<WG3014> departed<WG565> from<WG575> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> he was cleansed.<WG2511>
And <WG2532> he straitly charged<WG1690> him,<WG846> and forthwith<WG2112> sent him away;<WG1544> <WG846>

And <WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> See <WG3708> thou say<WG2036> nothing<WG3367> to any man: <WG3367> but<WG235> go thy way,<WG5217> show<WG1166> thyself<WG4572> to the<WG3588> priest,<WG2409> and<WG2532> offer<WG4374> for<WG4012> thy<WG4675> cleansing<WG2512> those things which<WG3739> Moses<WG3475> commanded,<WG4367> for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> unto them. <WG846>

But <WG1161> he<WG3588> went out,<WG1831> and began<WG756> to publish<WG2784> it much,<WG4183> and<WG2532> to blaze abroad<WG1310> the<WG3588> matter,<WG3056> insomuch that<WG5620> Jesus<WG846> could<WG1410> no more<WG3371> openly<WG5320> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the city,<WG4172> but<WG235> was<WG2258> without<WG1854> in<WG1722> desert<WG2048> places:<WG5117> and<WG2532> they came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him<WG846> from every quarter.<WG3836>
